Anderson is an statistical geneticist, currently working as a Research Associate at [Dr. Rosa's lab](https://www.gjmrosa.org/) (University of Wisconsin-Madison). His research focuses on developing and applying quantitative genomics and machine learning methods for solving livestock production problems.
